actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Resolution that the House of Representatives disapproves that portion of the plan submitted by the Secretary of the Interior, pursuant to the provisions of the Act of October 19, 1973 (87 Stat. 460), providing for the distribution of funds appropriated in satisfaction of an award of the Indian Claims Commission to the Tonawanda Band of Seneca Indians in certain dockets.

summary.text: Disapproves a plan submitted by the Secretary of the Interior providing for the use and distribution of funds appropriated in satisfaction of an Indian Claims Commission award to the Tonawanda Band of Seneca Indians.

titles.title: Resolution that the House of Representatives disapproves that portion of the plan submitted by the Secretary of the Interior, pursuant to the provisions of the Act of October 19, 1973 (87 Stat. 460), providing for the distribution of funds appropriated in satisfaction of an award of the Indian Claims Commission to the Tonawanda Band of Seneca Indians in certain dockets.
